name: btar
description: A basic for library creating and reading USTar files in the browser.

scripts.build: echo '=> build' && npm run compile && npm run rollup && npm run minify
scripts.compile: echo '=> compile' && npm run compile:js && npm run compile:dts
scripts.rollup: echo '=> rollup' && rollup lib/esmodule.js -o lib/index.js -f umd -n btar -m --sourcemapExcludeSources
scripts.minify: echo '=> minify' && npm run minify:esmodule && npm run minify:index
scripts.minify:esmodule: echo '=> minify:esmodule' && terser lib/esmodule.js --config-file terser/esmodule.json -o lib/esmodule.min.js
scripts.minify:index: echo '=> minify:index' && terser lib/index.js --config-file terser/index.json -o lib/index.min.js
